ca.mcgill.ecse211.Project.Localization

Class LightLocalization

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.Project.Localization.LightLocalization

  • public class LightLocalization
extends java.lang.Object
    This class houses all the required methods for our light localization routine
    Author:
    Mael

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LightLocalization(EV3LargeRegulatedMotor leftMotor, EV3LargeRegulatedMotor rightMotor, SampleProvider usSensorProvider, SampleProvider leftLightProvider, SampleProvider rightLightProvider, Navigation navigation)
      Constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static float getLeftRValue()
      This method returns the R Color Reading from the left light sensor
      static float getRightRValue()
      This method returns the R Color Reading from the right light sensor
      void localize()
      This is our new light localization routine, the robot goes forward until it sees a black line, aligns itself turns 90 degrees in the correct correction to face the closest grid point, goes forward until sees a black line and aligns itself on the point
      double reLocalize()
      This method is used to relocalize only on one axis depending on the tunnel orientation.
      double reLocalizeAgain()
      This method is used to relocalize on both axis by facing the tunnel entrance, reversing and correcting on that axis then turning 90 degrees and doing the same to correct on the other axis.
      void update()
      This method sets the odometer values correctly based on starting corner.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • localize

        public void localize()
        This is our new light localization routine, the robot goes forward until it sees a black line, aligns itself turns 90 degrees in the correct correction to face the closest grid point, goes forward until sees a black line and aligns itself on the point

      • reLocalize

        public double reLocalize()
        This method is used to relocalize only on one axis depending on the tunnel orientation. It corrects by re aligning the robot on the opposite axis of the tunnel's orientation
        Returns:

      • reLocalizeAgain

        public double reLocalizeAgain()
        This method is used to relocalize on both axis by facing the tunnel entrance, reversing and correcting on that axis then turning 90 degrees and doing the same to correct on the other axis.
        Returns:

      • getRightRValue

        public static float getRightRValue()
        This method returns the R Color Reading from the right light sensor
        Returns:

      • getLeftRValue

        public static float getLeftRValue()
        This method returns the R Color Reading from the left light sensor
        Returns:

      • update

        public void update()
        This method sets the odometer values correctly based on starting corner. This method is used after the main localize routine
